job.title: Junior Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtAbout the RoleltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtVeritonic is looking to hire a Jr Machine Learning Engineer who will play a significant role in continuing to advance our understanding of the human response to audioltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe ideal candidate will have proficiency with deep learning frameworks like Tensorflow andor Pytorch Exposure to building deep learning based systems and experience with the full machine learning development cycle data study model creation training testing deployment and monitoringltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtAbout VeritonicltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtVeritonic is a technology company focused on improving the way brands use audio as part of their marketing strategy  from sonic branding and podcast advertising to smart speaker experiences and social audio Brands use Veritonic analytics to know that their audio marketing resonates with consumersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtVeritonic is 6 years old and operating in a fastpaced market headquartered in New York City with employees in Denver Phoenix San Francisco and London Our most recent funding round was in August 2020 and included Greycroft Lerer Hippeau and AudibleltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtVeritonic is an equal opportunities employer We seek a diverse range of candidates from all backgrounds to foster a culture of inclusivity mutual respect creativity and fun We hire based on merit and qualifications for open positions and do not discriminate against employees or applicants on any basis Being true to these values is the only way we believe to create a truly winning team and organizationltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtKey ResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtStudy and transform Audio and Textual data to design ML systemsltligtltligtResearch and implement deep learning systemsltligtltligtBuild ML Pipeline for Audio and Text dataltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtAbout YoultstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtProficiency with deep learning frameworks TFPytorchltligtltligtExperience building deep learning based systemltligtltligtExperience in the full ML development cycle Data Study Model Creation Training Testing Deployment MonitoringltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat We OfferltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtBy joining Veritonic you will be part of an early stage creative and dynamic company undergoing
